title: CJCSC attends inauguration ceremony of KHINAMS
content:
RAWALPINDI, Sep 24 (APP): General Sahir Shamshad Mirza, Chairman Joint Chiefs of Staff Committee (CJCSC), attended the inauguration ceremony of King Hamad Institute of Nursing and Associated Medical Sciences (KHINAMS) as the chief guest in Islamabad.
The ceremony was also attended by General Shaikh Mohammed Bin Isa Bin Salman Al Khalifa, Commander Bahrain National Guard and other senior civil-military officers, said an ISPR news release on Wednesday.
The CJCSC underscored the strong bilateral relation between Pakistan and Bahrain. He further said that the inauguration of KHINAMS marked an important milestone in advancing medical education, expressing confidence that the institute would produce competent healthcare professionals and set new benchmarks in nursing and associated medical sciences in Pakistan.
